entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
